result.title: Can you help us?
result.content:
Hello,

We are sorry to bother you by this post. But currently we don't find any better solution by ourselves.

Recently we(me & rifat2704) were learning matching / flow related topics. But we have found that, these topics are hard nut to crack. We know some algorithms like, Hungarian algorithm for matching, Edmond Karp etc. But we failed to find a friend who knows flow / matching related topics well enough to clear our confusion in some areas. If you have enough time to help us, kindly message in private so that we may discuss the topics over video / voice call over any social networking site.

Thanks in advance for your kind help.
